casebody.data:
SKINNER et al.
v.
PREFERRED CREDIT et al. No. 525A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 18, 2005. William G. Wright, Wilmington, A. Holt Rowell, III, Mount Pleasant, SC, Daniel Myers, Eric G. Calhoun, Dallas, TX, for Skinners et al. Hada V. Haulsee, Bradley R. Johnson, Winston-Salem, Ronald R. Davis, Greensboro, for Preferred Credit Trust. Robert R. Marcus, Angela L. Little, Greensboro, Daniel J. Tobin, for Impac Funding.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of October 2005 by Plaintiffs for Extension of Time to File Brief 30 days from the ruling of the Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiffs shall have up to and including the 30th day from the ruling of Petition for Writ of Certioarl to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of October 2005."
